project.description:
This will build a the latest jenkins container and will install:
• docker-ce
• docker-compose
This will also add docker group to Jenkins user as well as install:
• vim
• tree
• htop
• sudo

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Dockerhub repo owner. **In GOBii this is gadm01 where as the login is gadmreader.**

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: The password used by dockerhub user 'gadmreader' which is a collaborator on the repos owned by 'gadm01'.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch from the jenkins repo used for the build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_LOGIN_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the username used to log into Dockerhub. (gadmreader) **This is different from DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME as in GOBii gadm01 is the owner where as gadmreader is the collaborator with access to the repos.**

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
#--------------------------------------#
set -e # Abort script at first error set -u # Attempt to use undefined variable outputs error message #set -x # Verbose with commands displayed
#--------------------------------------#
echo "$BRANCH" BUILD_TAG="$BRANCH"_$(date +"%Y%m%d")_build_$BUILD_NUMBER echo "BUILD_TAG is set as: $BUILD_TAG"; echo;
#--------------------------------------# # Remove any jenkins/jenkins:latest images
docker rmi -f jenkins/jenkins:latest
#--------------------------------------# # running jenkins image build
cd ~/jenkins_container_build/
time docker image build -t $DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME/$DOCKER_HUB_REPO_NAME:$BUILD_TAG .
#--------------------------------------# # log into dockerhub
set +x # Turning down verbosity as the password is echoed to stdout docker logout docker login -u $DOCKER_HUB_LOGIN_USERNAME -p $DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD set -x
#--------------------------------------# # push image
time docker push $DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME/$DOCKER_HUB_REPO_NAME:$BUILD_TAG
#--------------------------------------# # Remove any jenkins/jenkins:latest images
docker rmi -f jenkins/jenkins:latest
#--------------------------------------#
echo "Jenkins image build Completed!"
